name: Soopy
description:
Soopy - A whacky RPG Maker game about a guy named Sam and his quest to find a toilet for his new house. This is my first official game so I'd appreciate it if some people gave it a shot. Soopy is an extremely small game with an average play time of about 30 minutes, so if you have a spare half an hour then you should probably give this game a try, I'm happy to receive your feedback.

 Disclaimer : When playing this you will likely be either really disappointed or somewhat surprised with this game, so all I ask is that when playing my game, please play it with an open mind and knowledge that this is my first official game. Thank you and enjoy!
